feed.title: GitHub Swift Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Swift in GitHub

entry.title: farzaa/freewrite
entry.summary:
hi, this is freewrite

a simple, open-source mac app to freewrite.

download latest version here

if you wanna make an addition + pr, or just wanna remix the app for yourself go for it.

  • clone repo.
  • open in xcode.
  • click build.
  • done -- you're up and running.

make changes on a pr and i'll run on my end and then build a new version :).
